required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Post Study Continuation of C7 for G1D
clinical_study.official_title: Post Study Continuation of C7 for G1D
clinical_study.source: University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center

brief_summary.textblock: This protocol provides ongoing access to triheptanoin for patients who did complete an initial pilot protocol, and provides the opportunity to collect long-term safety data from patients treated with triheptanoin.

detailed_description.textblock: Only patients who completed the initial pilot study were eligible. The study is ongoing with these patients only.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients enrolled in the pilot trial (UTSW 122010-186)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who did not complete the pilot trial (UTSW 122010-186)

link.description: The Rare Brain Disorders Program at UT Southwestern: Clinical Research Studies
